DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy ABT-450/ritonavir/ABT-267 ( ABT-450/r/ABT-267 ; ABT-450 also know paritaprevir ; ABT-267 also know ombitasvir ) ABT-333 ( also know dasabuvir ) coadministered ribavirin ( RBV ) hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) genotype 1-infected adult compensate cirrhosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy ABT-450/Ritonavir/ABT-267 ; ( ABT-267 Also Known Ombitasvir ) ABT-333 ( Also Known Dasabuvir ) Coadministered With Ribavirin ( RBV ) Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Genotype 1-infected Adults With Compensated Cirrhosis
DOC.detailed_description: During treatment period study , participant receive treatment ABT-450/ritonavir/ABT-267 ABT-333 coadministered RBV either 12 24 week . Upon complete treatment period premature discontinuation treatment period , participant enter 48-week post-treatment period .
DOC.criteria: Females must practice specific form birth control study treatment , postmenopausal 2 year surgically sterile Male female 18 70 year , inclusive , time Screening . Chronic HCVinfection prior study enrollment . Screening laboratory result indicate HCV genotype 1infection . Compensated cirrhosis define ChildPugh Score less equal 6 Screening Subject plasma HCV RNA level great 10,000 IU/mL Screening .
